org.safs

Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.RSA

  • public class RSA
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality to
    • generate the RSA public/private key pair
    • encrypt the secrete data with public key
    • decrypt the encrypted data by private key
    Usage:

      //generate a pair (public-key and private-key) and print them to console
      //user needs to move the mouse on the screen to provide random data for generating keys
    • java org.safs.RSA -gen
      //generate a pair (public-key and private-key) and print them to file 'outputfile'
    • java org.safs.RSA -gen -out outputfile 
      Below is an example of generated key pair, the public-key is in section __RSAPublicKey__
and the private-key is in section __RSAPrivateKey__

__RSAPublicKey__
MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCU+Myd2Bax9lDac5fjvl8k4QUTXsBt37BF1h4M
2eGs9HXapi6izJbrE+1/Y1iMtR+jvd/tMxEltbU9ZdfsAk1vC859O9pga6/+AeoYkS2Gh7tmmAUc
PpafagY62A1ehrM9j0THvdNbyuQhnVh3ipKaMV4Cv4fMsZBPQhq3TZKLCwIDAQAB

__RSAPrivateKey__
MIICeAIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCAmIwggJeAgEAAoGBAJT4zJ3YFrH2UNpzl+O+XyThBRNe

imrUc9d3yCll
      //encrypt the secret-data with public-key and print the encrypted-data to console
      //-data can be followed by secret-data or a file holding secret-data
      //-key can be followed by public-key or a file holding public-key
    • java org.safs.RSA -encrypt -data "secret data"/file -key "public key"/file
      //encrypt the secret-data with public-key and print the encrypted-data to 'outputfile'
    • java org.safs.RSA -encrypt -data "secret data"/file -key "public key"/file -out outputfile

      //decrypt the encrypted-data with private-key and print the original-data to console
      //-data can be followed by encrypted-data or a file holding encrypted-data
      //-key can be followed by private-key or a file holding private-key
    • java org.safs.RSA -decrypt -data "encrypted data"/file -key "private key"/file
      //decrypt the encrypted-data with private-key and print the original-data to 'outputfile'
    • java org.safs.RSA -decrypt -data "encrypted data"/file -key "private key"/file -out outputfile
    History:

    Mar 31, 2014 (Lei Wang) Initial release.

      static java.lang.String CLASS_NAME 
      static int ENGRYPT_KEY_LENGHT
      The default length of generated key, it is 1024

      The algorithm of encryption, it is 'RSA'

      The map key for storing a private key in the map, it is '__RSAPrivateKey__'
      static java.lang.String MAPKEY_FOR_PUBLICKEY
      The map key for storing a public key in the map, it is '__RSAPublicKey__'

      The algorithm of signature, it is 'MD5withRSA'
      static java.lang.String UTF8_CHARSET
      The default encoding used to interpret plain-text, it is 'UTF-8'

                                    java.lang.String encodedPrivateKey)
                             throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        data - byte[], the data to sign
        encodedPrivateKey - String, the base64 encoded private key string
        Returns:

      • verifySignature

        public static boolean verifySignature(byte[] data,
                                      java.lang.String encodedPublicKey,
                                      java.lang.String encodedSignature)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Use 'public key' to verify the data is signed (signed by 'private key') correclty.
        Parameters:
        data - byte[], the signed data (by 'private key')
        encodedPublicKey - String, the base64-encoded public key.
        encodedSignature - String, the base64-encoded signature.
        Returns:
        true if the data is signed by the right person (private key)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public static java.lang.String encryptByPrivateKey(java.lang.String data,
                                                   java.lang.String encodedPrivateKey)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypt the string data by private key, data is interpreted as UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        data - String, the string data to encrypt, it will be interpreted as UTF-8 encoding
        encodedPrivateKey - String, the base64-encoded private key
        Returns:
        String, the base64-encoded encrypted data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public static java.lang.String decryptByPublicKey(java.lang.String data,
                                                  java.lang.String encodedPublicKey)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypt the base64-encoded enctyped string data by public key.
        Parameters:
        data - String, the base64-encoded string data to decrypt, the decrypted bytes will be interpreted by UTF-8 encoding
        encodedPublicKey - String, the base64-encoded public key
        Returns:
        String the uts-8 encoded decrypted string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • decryptByPublicKey

        public static java.lang.String decryptByPublicKey(java.lang.String data,
                                                  java.lang.String encodedPublicKey,
                                                  java.lang.String encoding)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        encodedPublicKey - String, the base64-encoded public key
        encoding - String, the encoding used to interpret the decryped bytes.
        Returns:
        String the decrypted string (encoded by parameter encoding)

      • initKeys

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> initKeys()
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate key-pair, the public-key and private-key; then base64-encode them and put them into a map.
        Returns:
        Map, a map containing base64-encoded key pairs,
        <MAPKEY_FOR_PRIVATEKEY, encoded-private-key-string>
        <MAPKEY_FOR_PUBLICKEY, encoded-public-key-string>
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
